remarks: Value of projectivity from vector space H to dual space.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Jan-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mapdval2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdval2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdval2.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
mapdval2.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
mapdval2.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
mapdval2.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
mapdval2.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdval2.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdval2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdval2.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. S ) $.
mapdval2.c $e |- C = { g e. F | ( O ` ( O ` ( L ` g ) ) ) = ( L ` g ) } $.
mapdval3N $p |- ( ph -> ( M ` T ) = U_ v e. T { f e. C | ( O ` ( L ` f ) ) = ( N ` { v } ) } ) $.
$d C f v $.
$d F f g $.
$d K f $.
$d L g v $.
$d N v $.
$d O g v $.
$d T f v $.
$d U v $.
$d W f $.
$d f ph v $.
